flavor: You served a stint with Cannithâ€™s Tinkers Guild, traveling from town to town and earning coin for House Cannith by fixing countless broken items. What strange communities did you visit? Did you enjoy life on the road, or were you bucking for a different post within the House? And given that the Tinkers Guild is less hierarchical than the rest of the House, did you find the egalitarian nature of the Tinkers liberating or frustrating?
name: Cannith Tinker
